issue.title: [Java] RangeEqualVisitor does not properly compare ZeroVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6215](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6215). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ZeroVector.accept and RangeEqualVisitor always return True no matter what type of other vector is compared

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6215?focusedCommentId=16905675) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5070
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5070>
